item.title: Andreas Antonopoulos AMA with the 8BTC Community - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Andreas Antonopoulos AMA with the 8BTC Community - NEWSBTC

Andreas Antonopoulos, in an interaction with the Chinese Bitcoin community, spoke about the future of Bitcoin among other cryptocurrency related stuff. Read more... The Chinese Bitcoin community is one of the major stakeholders in the digital currency ecosystem. Thanks to their active participation in mining and trading related activities.

item.title: Bitcoin is not money, rules Miami judge
item.description:
Bitcoin is not money, rules Miami judge

A Miami, FL.-based judge issued a ruling last week in a criminal case involving bitcoin and money laundering that the world's most popular digital currency is not money, reported Forbes. Mitchell E...

item.title: How do I buy a bitcoin?
item.description:
How do I buy a bitcoin?

My little cousin was studying countries and their capitals. I took his book, so I could start asking him and checking the answers: -What's the capital of Brazil? -Bras√≠lia. -France? -Paris. -Germany? -... -Germany? -... -C'mon, that's an easy one. It starts with "B".

item.title: Lisk is Not a Fork of Ethereum, CEO Max Kordek States
item.description:
Lisk is Not a Fork of Ethereum, CEO Max Kordek States

In the wake of the split into ETH and ETC - Ethereum Classic, following the recent hack of The DAO on the Ethereum platform which led to a hard fork to recover the stolen funds, Max Kordek, Lisk CEO, has come out to "clean up some misunderstandings, and explain briefly what Lisk is and what it isn't."

item.title: 51Pool Attack Plans 51% Network Attack Against Ethereum Classic
item.description:
51Pool Attack Plans 51% Network Attack Against Ethereum Classic

It is evident for everyone to see this is not an effort representing the entire Ethereum community. Unfortunately, every single supporter will be caught in the crossfire of repercussions that will undoubtedly follow these attacks, Over the past few days, there have been various rumors regarding an impending 51% attack against the Ethereum Classic network.

item.title: 247exchange.com adds 6 more national currencies for buying coins with credit/debit cards
item.description:
247exchange.com adds 6 more national currencies for buying coins with credit/debit cards

International exchange service 247exchange.com has added six additional national currencies for instantly buying bitcoin and other supported digital currencies with credit/debit cards on the platfo...

item.title: US Slowly Going Cash-Free, But Where's the Bitcoin?
item.description:
US Slowly Going Cash-Free, But Where's the Bitcoin?

The US is starting to follow Europe down the 100% digital cash path - but does the mainstream media see Bitcoin as part of the solution? Also read: A Cashless Society is Economic Apartheid (Without Bitcoin) An article in this weekend's New York Times gave the example of Sweetgreen, a chain of healthy-eating restaurants.

item.title: Bitcoin's Price Falls as Miners Meet Bitcoin Core Developers
item.description:
Bitcoin's Price Falls as Miners Meet Bitcoin Core Developers

Bitcoin's price dropped by $30 this morning as market uncertainty increases due to an on-going closed door meeting between Bitcoin miners and Bitcoin Core developers. Details are sparse as no media representatives or independent observers have been invited to arguably the most important meeting in bitcoin's almost eight-year history.

item.title: Bitcoin Thrives in Malaysia
item.description:
Bitcoin Thrives in Malaysia

Increasing financial corruption and a weakening currency pushes people to try alternative financial systems like Bitcoin. No wonder that Bitcoin is thriving in Malaysia. 1Malaysia Development Bhd, or 1MDB as it is popularly known, is a state investment vehicle set up in 2009 to turn Kuala Lampur into a global financial hub.
